feature.label: ForgedUIEditor
feature.description: ForgedUI makes Titanium Mobile App development quicker and easier by providing a visual drag-and-drop interface that allows for quick screen design and Titanium cross-platform code-generation. Choose to design and generate code for iOS, Android or both platforms. Either way, ForgedUI takes the tedium out of designing Titanium app user interfaces leaving you more time to focus on other aspects of your app
feature.copyright: Copyright 2011/2012 ForgedUI by BSP Softworks Inc. All Rights Reserved.
